content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you having any issues with your plumbing, electrical, or heating and cooling systems?
Hi there. Yeah, my AC doesn’t seem to be working very well. I think I need someone to look at it.
I'm sorry to hear about your AC! Can I get your name to get started with scheduling an appointment?
Sure, it’s George. What do you need next?
Thank you, George! Can you please provide the address where you need the AC service?
Great, thank you! Can you let me know what time would work best for you to have a technician come by and check your AC?
Let me check my calendar real quick—oh, someone’s at my door. Sorry, I have to go. I’ll message back later if I still need help.
reason: Customer ended conversation due to being interrupted. Did not finish scheduling.
